lexUnit.name: improper.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: not in accordance with accepted standards of behaviour

sentence.text: As a result in December 1988 the government was forced to introduce the Security Service Bill to replace the Maxwell Fyfe guidelines and clearly identify MI5 's role , providing legal safeguards against improper behaviour .
